entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 07:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Occasional local drifting snow. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of light snow. Local drifting snow. Wind west 40 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
